mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, content, id, regdate, readcnt, etc, del, rating) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, curdate(), 0,#{etc}, 0,#{rating})
mapper.select: select * from board where del = 0 order by bno desc
mapper.update: update board set title =#{title}, content =#{content}, regdate =now() where bno =#{bno}
update board set del = 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select reno, rememo, rewriter, redate from board_reply where bno =#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board_reply (rememo, rewriter,redate,bno) values (#{rememo}, #{rewriter}, now(), #{bno})
mapper.select: select * FROM board where bno>0 order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from board where bno>0
